snippet: Jerry Coleman, a longtime broadcaster for the San Diego Padres and a Yankees infielder who played on four World Series championship teams, died at age 89.
abstract: Jerry Coleman, longtime broadcaster for the San Diego Padres and a New York Yankees infielder who played on four World Series championship teams, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Jerry Coleman, a longtime broadcaster for the San Diego Padres and a Yankees infielder who played on four World Series championship teams, died at age 89.
